顧.definition: to look after; to take into consideration; to attend to

顧不及.definition: (of sb who is preoccupied with doing sth) to pay no heed to (a less pressing consideration)

顧不得.definition: unable to change sth; unable to deal with

顧全.definition: to give careful consideration to; to display thoughtfulness towards

顧全大局.definition: to take the big picture into consideration (idiom); to work for the benefits of all

顧及.definition: to take into consideration; to attend to

顧家.definition: to take care of one's family

顧左右而言他.pinyin: gù zuǒ yòu ér yán tā
顧左右而言他.definition: (idiom) to digress from the topic of discussion

顧影自憐.definition: lit. looking at one's shadow and feeling sorry for oneself (idiom); fig. alone and dejected

顧忌.definition: to have misgivings; apprehension; worry; qualm; scruple

顧念.definition: to care for; to worry about

顧惜.definition: to take loving care of; to value

顧愷之.definition: Gu Kaizhi or Ku K'aichih (346-407), famous painter of Eastern Jin dynasty, one of the Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties 六朝四大家

顧慮.definition: misgivings; apprehensions; to worry about; to be concerned about

顧此失彼.definition: lit. to attend to one thing and lose sight of another (idiom); fig. to be unable to manage two or more things at once; cannot pay attention to one thing without neglecting the other

顧炎武.definition: Gu Yanwu (1613-1682), late Ming and early Qing Confucian philosopher, linguist and historian, played a founding role in phonology of early Chinese, author of Rizhilu or Record of daily study 日知錄|日知录

顧盼.definition: (literary) to look around; (literary) to care for

顧眄.definition: to turn one's head and look around

顧野王.definition: Gu Yewang (519-581), historian and an interpreter of classical texts, editor of Yupian 玉篇[Yu4 pian1]
